      • registerSchema

        public int registerSchema(String schemaName,
                          org.apache.avro.Schema schema)
        Register the schema with the kafka schema registry.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - the name of the schema
        schema - the avro schema
        Returns:
        the id for the schema returned from the schema registry.

      • serialize

        public byte[] serialize(org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord record)
                 throws IOException
        Serialize as appropriate to send a record to Kafka that contains information pertaining to the schema version that applies to this record.
        Parameters:
        record - a GenericRecord
        Returns:
        a byte array representing the encoded Generic record + schema ID
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem with the encoding
